data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 2,300 souls living in the state of Inarajan with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Inarajan, Guam

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Inarajan, Guam with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Over 7.48 percent of the people of Inarajan are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Inarajan, Guam.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Inarajan Village
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Inarajan Village, Inarajan, Guam.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Inarajan, Guam. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, you desire the people in the state of Inarajan who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.section_summary:
the state of Inarajan, Guam has a population of 2,300.

We estimate Inarajan has 366 people who might know Jesus, 1,762 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 172 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Inarajan, Guam.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
